$rkjam_raspberry_jam_description: A delicious pot of raspberry preserves.
$rkjam_honey_raspberry_jam_description: A delicious pot of raspberry preserves, sweetened with honey.
$rkjam_blueberry_jam_description: A delicious pot of blueberry preserves.
$rkjam_honey_blueberry_jam_description: A delicious pot of blueberry preserves, sweetened with honey.
$rkjam_cloudberry_jam_description: Delightfully tart cloudberries crushed, preserved and sweetened.
$rkjam_honey_cloudberry_jam_description: Delightfully tart cloudberries crushed, preserved and sweetened with fresh honey.
$rkjam_kings_jam_description: A new twist blend of raspberries and cloudberries.
$rkjam_nordic_jam_description: A traditional blend of blueberries and cloudberries.
$rkjam_mushroom_jam_description: A savory blend of mushrooms and onions, rendered down to a pleasing spread.
$rkjam_ashlands_jam_description: A rich blend of exotic ingredients that tingles on the way down.
